metadata.name: Suspicious Program Names
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious patterns in program names or folders that are often found in malicious samples or hacktools

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND ((contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\cve-202')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\cve202'))) AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\poc.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\artifact.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\artifact64.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\artifact_protected.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\artifact32.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\artifact32big.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('obfuscated.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('obfusc.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\meterpreter'))) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('inject.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('invoke-cve')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pupy.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('payload.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('beacon.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('powerview.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('bypass.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('obfuscated.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('obfusc.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('obfus.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('obfs.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('evil.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('minidogz.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('_enc.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\shell.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\rshell.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('revshell.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\av.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\av_test.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('adrecon.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('mimikatz.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\powerup_')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('powerup.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\temp\\a.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\temp\\p.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\temp\\1.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hound.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('encode.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('powercat.ps1'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious patterns in program names or folders that are often found in malicious samples or hacktools

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.cmd_line, process.parent_process.cmd_line, CurrentDirectory False positive: Legitimate tools that accidentally match on the searched patterns Reference: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1560.001/T1560.001.md
